title: Fast-Slow-Thinking: Complex Task Solving with Large Language Models
details: Y Sun, Y Zhang, Z Zhao, S Wan, D Tao, C Gong - arXiv preprint arXiv:2504.08690, 2025
abstract: Nowadays, Large Language Models (LLMs) have been gradually employed to solve complex tasks. To face the challenge, task decomposition has become an effective way, which proposes to divide a complex task into multiple simpler subtasks and …
